modName: Tscibe Body with Argonian and Fennec Alternate Body
summary:
These are my own body replacers. *There are no armors yet that is suitable for these bodies*
Another warning/tip: *If you have no modding skills or atleast worked with Caliente's bodysilder or nifskope, it might be best you ignore these files until further progress is made.* I don't care what you use my body replacers for, just tell m
descriptionHtml:
I've made 2 sets of body replacers (*needs fitted textures) *I need someone to help me create a skin map for the human races*.
And the same goes for the beastlike races: Argonian, Khajiit, and Jelly's Fennec (they need better textures). ^This project is in its Earliest State and isn't ready to be `lore-friendly or quality play^

Tscibe Body- is my own body replacer for all the playable races that relies on the 'femalebody_0 or1' file name.

Tscibe Argonian & Fennec Body:
-Is a separate body replacer mod that is made mainly for the Argonian and Jelly's Fennec race (http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=234034337)

* I need to make a .esp file to separate the TAF body from affecting (femalebody_) replacers (both Argonian & Fennec race will use different scaling sizes).

My Plans are:
adapting a gigantic arse load of armor and clothing mods from my own collection (from other modders) to my bodyreplacers, and that goes without saying to the vanilla armors.
------------------------------------------------------
List of problems:
Texture Seams&Clipping *mainly


----------------------------------------------------
Recommended mods:
Fennec Race by Jelly (on steamcommunity) http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=234034337

Kitling Race by Elfendrago (on steamcommunity) http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=219371477
----------------------------------------------------
Credits

Caliente's Bodyslide2 and Outfit Studio-> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?

Inspiring skin files:
SvarogNL 's Fitness Body normal maps

HoneyVanity's Barbarian and Milkdrinker Skin texture color maps: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/? (located in optional files)

author: TerronScibe
